thread.title: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4
thread.title_full: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4

title: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4
text:
> Top News Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4 Pittsburgh Pirates' Michael Morse, bottom, heads to first after being walked with the bases loaded by Cincinnati Reds relief pitcher Tony Cingrani, top, in the sixth inning of a baseball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Pittsburgh. The Pirates won 6-4 in 12 innings. (AP Photo/Keith Srakocic) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
